page.title: 16NEIGHBOURHOOD WATCH
page.content: ORIGINALLY THE NAME FOR THIS BODY WAS, NEIGHBOURHOOD WATCH.EACH YEAR BETWEEN 18 TO 19 CRIMES ARE COMMITTED, THESE ARE MAINLY BURGLARIES. THE IDEA OF THE COMMUNITY CRIME WATCH IS TO ENCOURAGE PEOPLE TO TELL THE POLICE WHAT THEY SEE AND HEAR AS THEY GO ON WITH THEIR DAILY LIVES.EACH STREET HAS A CONTACT AND THE INHABITANTS OF THAT STREET KNOW WHO THEIR CONTACT IS.THE ORGANISATION HAS BEEN IN EXISTENCE SINCE 15TH JUNE 1985. ALL OF BOZEAT'S POLICE CONSTABLES LIVE IN WELLINGBOROUGH, WOLLASTON OR NORTHAMPON.THERE ARE TWO THINGS WHICH POLICE ALWAYS REMEMBER, CRIME PREVENTION AND CRIME DETECTION. THE LOCAL POLICEMAN VISITS THE SCHOOL REGULARLY TO TALK ON ROAD SAFETY.HE ALSO HELPS AND TESTS CHILDREN FOR CYCLING PROFICIENCY.
